articles.title: Suspect Arrested in Charlie Kirk Assassination
articles.description: Authorities have arrested Tyler Robinson, a 22-year-old Utah resident, in connection with the assassination of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. The FBI released video footage and photos of the suspect, who was reportedly turned in by a family member. The motive is still under investigation, but family members indicated Robinson had become more political and expressed dislike for Kirk's viewpoints.

articles.title: Charlie Kirk Shooting Suspect in Custody; Family Friend Identified 22-Year-Old Utah Man
articles.description: The suspect in the assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk has been taken into custody. Officials identified the suspect as 22-year-old Tyler Robinson, a Utah resident with no known prior criminal record. The arrest followed a manhunt after Kirk was shot and killed on a college campus. The incident has raised concerns about political violence.

articles.title: Top News/Talk Media Stories This Past Week (September 8-12, 2025)
articles.description: This past week's top news and talk media stories include the assassination of Charlie Kirk, ICE raids and threats to Chicago, a Supreme Court ruling on ICE, the Epstein files, economic concerns, a ruling involving Lisa Cook, a raid on a GA Hyundai plant and U.S.-South Korea relations, and Poland intercepting Russian drones.
